resources.string:
Apple Overview: Nutritious fruit rich in fiber and antioxidants.
Common Diseases: Apple Scab, Fire Blight, Powdery Mildew, Cedar Apple Rust.
Prevention: Prune trees, remove infected parts, use resistant varieties.
Control: Apply fungicides, organic sprays, and improve air circulation.

Blueberry Overview: Nutrient-rich berry high in antioxidants and vitamins.
Common Diseases: Mummy Berry, Anthracnose, Leaf Rust, Botrytis Blight.
Prevention: Prune bushes, ensure good air circulation, use resistant varieties.
Control: Apply fungicides, remove infected fruit, maintain soil health.

Cherry Overview: Sweet, tart fruit high in vitamins and antioxidants.
Common Diseases: Brown Rot, Leaf Spot, Bacterial Canker, Powdery Mildew.
Prevention: Prune trees, remove infected fruit, use disease-free plants.
Control: Apply copper sprays, fungicides, and improve air circulation.

Corn Overview: Staple cereal crop rich in fiber and essential nutrients.
Common Diseases: Rust, Smut, Northern Leaf Blight, Stewart’s Wilt.
Prevention: Rotate crops, use resistant varieties, avoid wet soil.
Control: Apply fungicides, remove infected plants, manage weeds.

Grape Overview: Popular fruit for wine, juice, and fresh consumption.
Common Diseases: Downy Mildew, Powdery Mildew, Black Rot, Pierce’s Disease.
Prevention: Prune vines, ensure airflow, remove infected leaves.
Control: Use sulfur sprays, fungicides, and resistant grape varieties.

Orange Overview: Citrus fruit rich in vitamin C and immune-boosting compounds.
Common Diseases: Citrus Canker, Greening, Root Rot, Sooty Mold.
Prevention: Use certified trees, manage pests, maintain soil health.
Control: Apply copper sprays, remove infected leaves, control insects.

Peach Overview: Juicy fruit rich in vitamins A and C, promotes skin health.
Common Diseases: Peach Leaf Curl, Brown Rot, Bacterial Spot, Gummosis.
Prevention: Prune trees, plant resistant varieties, avoid overhead watering.
Control: Apply fungicides, remove infected fruit, use copper sprays.

Pepperball Overview: Spicy fruit used for seasoning and medicinal purposes.
Common Diseases: Bacterial Spot, Anthracnose, Mosaic Virus, Wilt.
Prevention: Use disease-free seeds, avoid overhead watering, rotate crops.
Control: Remove infected plants, apply fungicides, manage pests.

Potato Overview: Staple tuber crop, rich in carbohydrates and vitamins.
Common Diseases: Late Blight, Blackleg, Scab, Potato Virus Y.
Prevention: Use certified seeds, rotate crops, manage soil health.
Control: Remove infected plants, apply fungicides, control pests.

Soybeans Overview: Protein-rich legume used in food and animal feed.
Common Diseases: Soybean Rust, Root Rot, Brown Spot, Mosaic Virus.
Prevention: Rotate crops, use resistant varieties, manage moisture.
Control: Apply fungicides, remove diseased plants, ensure drainage.

Squash Overview: Nutrient-rich vegetable used in various cuisines.
Common Diseases: Powdery Mildew, Mosaic Virus, Wilt, Anthracnose.
Prevention: Space plants properly, use disease-resistant varieties.
Control: Remove infected leaves, apply fungicides, control insects.

Raspberry Overview: Sweet, tart berry high in fiber and antioxidants.
Common Diseases: Cane Blight, Powdery Mildew, Root Rot, Mosaic Virus.
Prevention: Prune canes, avoid wet soil, use disease-resistant plants.
Control: Apply fungicides, remove infected canes, manage irrigation.

Tomato Overview: Popular vegetable rich in vitamins and antioxidants.
Common Diseases: Blight, Wilt, Leaf Curl Virus, Mosaic Virus.
Prevention: Rotate crops, stake plants, ensure proper ventilation.
Control: Remove infected leaves, apply fungicides, control pests.

Strawberry Overview: Juicy berry rich in vitamin C and antioxidants.
Common Diseases: Gray Mold, Leaf Spot, Powdery Mildew, Anthracnose.
Prevention: Space plants properly, use mulch, avoid overhead watering.
Control: Apply fungicides, remove infected fruit, improve drainage.
